metadata.title: CVE-2022-36765 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2 is susceptible to a vulnerability in the CreateHob() function,allowing a user to trigger a integer overflow to buffer overflow via alocal network. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may result ina compromise of confidentiality, integrity, and/or availability.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
